hadiths.text: Narrated `Aisha:that the Prophet (ﷺ) married her when she was six years old and he consummated his marriage when she was nine years old. Hisham said: I have been informed that `Aisha remained with the Prophet (ﷺ) for nine years (i.e. till his death)

chapter.ara-name: باب تَزْوِيجِ الأَبِ ابْنَتَهُ مِنَ الإِمَامِ
chapter.eng-name: The marrying of a daughter by her father to a ruler
